0.7.3.name: wordpress/optimized-latex
0.7.3.description:
If you want math forumals on your website and dont want the page to load 1 second slower, this is the plugin for you. This is an optimized version of two other latex plugins. It is easy to use and the Latex syntax gives you alot of examples how to write nice latex.

This plugin does not allow you to use your own latex server. (If you have your own latex server you would probaply not need this plugin anyway.)
